name: IoTeX
introduce:
IoTeX is an EVM-compatible L1 blockchain that provides secured interactions between humans and machines. IoTeX was launched in 2017 with a vision to power the Internet of Trusted Things, an ecosystem of secured data, devices and users.
By creating a platform for the Internet of Trusted Things, IoTeX powers a decentralized network of DApps (Cyclone, Mimo), smart devices (UCam, Pebble), services (ioPay, ioTube), and digital assets to deliver better value to end users.
